verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Now it came to pass upon a day וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3129><s%> that Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> unto the young man נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> that bare כֵלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> his armour לְכָ֗ה <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַעְבְּרָה֙ <S%H5674><s%> and let us go over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מַצַּ֣ב <S%H4673><s%> garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> to the Philistines' אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> is on מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> other הַלָּ֑ז <S%H1975><s%> side וּלְאָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> not his father לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> But he told

וְשָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul יוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> tarried בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> in the uttermost הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <S%H1390><s%> part of Gibeah תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָרִמּ֖וֹן <S%H7416><s%> under a pomegranate tree אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּמִגְר֑וֹן <S%H4051><s%> which [is] in Migron וְהָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> him about כְּשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> that [were] with him [were] about six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַאֲחִיָּ֣ה <S%H281><s%> And Ahiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִט֡וּב <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub אֲחִ֡י <S%H251><s%> brother אִיכָב֣וֹד ׀ <S%H350><s%> Ichabod's בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פִּינְחָ֨ס <S%H6372><s%> of Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֵלִ֜י <S%H5941><s%> of Eli כֹּהֵ֧ן ׀ <S%H3548><s%> priest יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S בְּשִׁל֖וֹ <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> wearing אֵפ֑וֹד <S%H646><s%> an ephod וְהָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And the people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הָלַ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> was gone יוֹנָתָֽן׃ <S%H3129><s%> not that Jonathan

וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> Between הַֽמַּעְבְּר֗וֹת <S%H4569><s%> And between the passages אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> sought יֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3129><s%> by which Jonathan לַֽעֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> to go over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מַצַּ֣ב <S%H4673><s%> garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> unto the Philistines' שֵׁן־ <S%H8127><s%> [there was] a sharp הַסֶּ֤לַע <S%H5553><s%> rock מֵהָעֵ֙בֶר֙ <S%H5676><s%> on the one side מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> the one וְשֵׁן־ <S%H8127><s%> and a sharp הַסֶּ֥לַע <S%H5553><s%> rock מֵהָעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> the other וְשֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> of the one בּוֹצֵ֔ץ <S%H949><s%> [was] Bozez וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> of the other סֶֽנֶּה׃ <S%H5573><s%> Seneh

הַשֵּׁ֧ן <S%H8127><s%> The forefront הָאֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> of the one מָצ֥וּק <S%H4690><s%> [was] situate מִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> northward מ֣וּל <S%H4136><s%> over against מִכְמָ֑שׂ <S%H4363><s%> Michmash וְהָאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and the other מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> southward מ֥וּל <S%H4136><s%> over against גָּֽבַע׃ <S%H1387><s%> Gibeah ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹנָתָ֜ן <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנַּ֣עַר ׀ <S%H5288><s%> to the young man נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> that bare כֵלָ֗יו <S%H3627><s%> his armour לְכָה֙ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַעְבְּרָ֗ה <S%H5674><s%> and let us go over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַצַּב֙ <S%H4673><s%> unto the garrison הָעֲרֵלִ֣ים <S%H6189><s%> of these uncircumcised הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these אוּלַ֛י <S%H194><s%> perhaps יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> will work יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> it may be that the LORD לָ֑נוּ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> for לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD מַעְצ֔וֹר <S%H4622><s%> for us for [there is] no restraint לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> to save בְּרַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> by many א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בִמְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> or by few

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> his armor עֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> unto him Do כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> is in בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> all that [is] in thine heart נְטֵ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> turn לָ֔ךְ הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> according כִּלְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3824><s%> thee behold I [am] with thee according to thy heart ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> Then said יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עֹבְרִ֖ים <S%H5674><s%> Behold we will pass over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> unto [these] men וְנִגְלִ֖ינוּ <S%H1540><s%> and we will discover אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> they יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> If they say אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to us דֹּ֕מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> thus unto us Tarry עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַגִּיעֵ֖נוּ <S%H5060><s%> until we come אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to you וְעָמַ֣דְנוּ <S%H5975><s%> to you then we will stand still תַחְתֵּ֔ינוּ <S%H8478><s%> our place וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not נַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> in our place and will not go up אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> But

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if כֹּ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> they יֹאמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> But if they say עֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> thus Come up עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> us וְעָלִ֔ינוּ <S%H5927><s%> unto us then we will go up כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נְתָנָ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בְּיָדֵ֑נוּ <S%H3027><s%> them into our hand וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> and this לָּ֖נוּ הָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H226><s%> and this [shall be] a sign

וַיִּגָּל֣וּ <S%H1540><s%> of them discovered שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> And both אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַצַּ֖ב <S%H4673><s%> themselves unto the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> said פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עִבְרִים֙ <S%H5680><s%> Behold the Hebrews יֹֽצְאִ֔ים <S%H3318><s%> come forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַחֹרִ֖ים <S%H2356><s%> out of the holes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> they הִתְחַבְּאוּ־ <S%H2244><s%> where they had hid שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וַיַּעֲנוּ֩ <S%H6030><s%> answered אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמַּצָּבָ֜ה <S%H4675><s%> of the garrison אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹנָתָ֣ן ׀ <S%H3129><s%> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֗יו <S%H3627><s%> and his armor וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and said עֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> Come up אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to וְנוֹדִ֥יעָה <S%H3045><s%> to us and we will shew אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> you a thing פ וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹנָתָ֜ן <S%H3129><s%> And Jonathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נֹשֵׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָיו֙ <S%H3627><s%> to his armor עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> Come up אַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> after כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נְתָנָ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> me for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> climbed up יוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3129><s%> And Jonathan עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> upon his hands וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> and upon his feet וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> his armor אַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> after וַֽיִּפְּלוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> him and they fell לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יוֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> Jonathan וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> and his armor מְמוֹתֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> slew אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וַתְּהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become הַמַּכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter הָרִאשֹׁנָ֗ה <S%H7223><s%> And that first אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הִכָּ֧ה <S%H5221><s%> made יוֹנָתָ֛ן <S%H3129><s%> which Jonathan וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> and his armor כְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> was about twenty אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men כְּבַחֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> within as it were an half מַעֲנָ֖ה <S%H4618><s%> acre צֶ֥מֶד <S%H6776><s%> [which] a yoke שָׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of land

וַתְּהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> became חֲרָדָ֨ה <S%H2731><s%> And there was trembling בַמַּחֲנֶ֤ה <S%H4264><s%> in the host בַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> in the field וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and among all the people הַמַּצָּב֙ <S%H4673><s%> the garrison וְהַמַּשְׁחִ֔ית <S%H7843><s%> and the spoilers חָרְד֖וּ <S%H2729><s%> they also trembled גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וַתִּרְגַּ֣ז <S%H7264><s%> quaked הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> became לְחֶרְדַּ֥ת <S%H2731><s%> trembling אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> so it was a very great

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> looked הַצֹּפִים֙ <S%H6822><s%> And the watchmen לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul בְּגִבְעַ֖ת <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הֶהָמ֛וֹן <S%H1995><s%> and behold the multitude נָמ֖וֹג <S%H4127><s%> melted away וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַהֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H1986><s%> on beating down פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul לָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for פִּקְדוּ־ <S%H6485><s%> that [were] with him Number נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now וּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> now and see מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> who הָלַ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> who is gone מֵעִמָּ֑נוּ <S%H5973><s%> they וַֽיִּפְקְד֔וּ <S%H6485><s%> from us And when they had numbered וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> behold יוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3129><s%> behold Jonathan וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H3627><s%> and his armor

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul לַֽאֲחִיָּ֔ה <S%H281><s%> unto Ahiah הַגִּ֖ישָׁה <S%H5066><s%> Bring hither אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> For the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> was at that time הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> While דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> talked שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And it came to pass while Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest וְהֶהָמ֗וֹן <S%H1995><s%> that the noise אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> it בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> that [was] in the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> on הָל֖וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> continued וָרָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> and increased פ וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest אֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> Withdraw יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand
